title: STAT+: Newborn screening can save lives, but worries about potential harm slow adoption in the U.K.
description: U.K. health officials are facing pressure to rethink how they expand the list of diseases that all newborns are screened for as new therapies become available.
content: U.K. health officials are facing pressure to rethink how they expand the list of diseases that all newborns are screened for as new therapies become available.
